scripts.mobile:add: npx cap add android --config mobile/capacitor.config.ts && npx cap add ios --config mobile/capacitor.config.ts
scripts.mobile:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync --config mobile/capacitor.config.ts
scripts.mobile:android: npm run mobile:sync && npx cap open android --config mobile/capacitor.config.ts
scripts.mobile:ios: npm run mobile:sync && npx cap open ios --config mobile/capacitor.config.ts
